name: Boxed by Christmas
description:
It's said that any "Toys" trapped in a Box have their spirits siphoned by the one known as Santa Claus. The lifeless bodies the Boxes leave behind are said to bring children everywhere happiness. There are many "Toys" who reject that idea and will survive, defiantly, until their last breaths.

Boxed by Christmas is a game about survival. Inspired by the gameplay in the asymmetrical multiplayer game Dead by Daylight, Boxed by Christmas brings to life a spin on the characteristics of Santa Claus. Boxed by Christmas was created in just under 24 hours, including the completion of code, art and sound assets. It was developed as part of an ongoing "Let's Dev" series on YouTube, which documents the trials & tribulations of learning to make video games.

Watch Boxed by Christmas being made on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOZiUKLr92kGcLh-ItvEGjOdxAIdnNbRs

This game is completely free to play. Monetary contributions are appreciated, but not necessary! Any funds earned from this project will go to both Itch.io (for their impressive service!) and my (Modest Zero) New Keyboard/Mouse fund so that (hopefully) future projects will not be built using busted hardware!

Thank you for your interest in Boxed by Christmas and I hope you enjoy it!
